Global Risk-On / Risk-Off Positioning Tone

CoT market tone: risk-on vs risk-off positioning.

As of 2025-10-14

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Overall market tone is currently Neutral, with a CoT Market Tone z-score of -0.4049 as of October 14, 2025.
  • Crowded long share is 0.2917, slightly above crowded short share of 0.2727 across 264 markets.
  • The most extreme recent condition was a brief Risk-Off regime on October 7, 2025 (z = -0.6202).
  • This followed another Risk-Off period on August 26, 2025 (z = -0.8350).

Technical Summary:

  • The robust z-score of -0.4049 places the market in a Neutral CoT Market Tone regime.
  • This current neutral stance reflects a small net positive tone of 0.0189.
  • The previous week's Risk-Off reading indicates a recent unwind from more bearish sentiment.
  • The slight move towards neutral suggests diminishing broad speculative short positioning.

References:

  • `Global_Positioning_Tone` dataset, latest timestamp: 2025-10-14 00:00:00.
  • CoT Market Tone z-score and regime values for October 14 and October 7 were most influential.
  • Publicly available sector-specific futures positioning data would improve granularity.
  • Global economic sentiment surveys could offer additional macro confirmation.
